env.CORS_ALLOW_METHODS: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS

headers.value: default-src * 'self' data: 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://book-m-searcher-online.vercel.app https://code.jquery.com https://fonts.googleapis.com https://fonts.gstatic.com https://*.vercel.app'; script-src 'https://code.jquery.com' 'https://book-m-searcher-online.vercel.app/js/main.js'; style-src 'https://book-m-searcher-online.vercel.app/public/css/styles.css' 'https://fonts.googleapis.com'; font-src 'https://fonts.gstatic.com'; img-src 'data: https://book-m-searcher-online.vercel.app'; connect-src 'https://*.vercel.app'; frame-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'none'; form-action 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests
